4.2. In-Memory IoT Stream Processing¶

4.2.1. IoT Stream¶

The ITTIA DB stream processing feature is designed for embedded systems real time data processing and enables devices to obtain insights to make sense of streams of data.

ITTIA DB is architected for both device real time data processing and historical data management. The real time data processing is conducted by ITTIA DB IoT stream. This important feature enables embedded system to monitor and continuously process streams of data, capture real time information, and empower the device to immediately act and notify when there is an abnormality.

4.2.2. Benefits¶

Query live, real-time data and have those queries continuously updated as new information arrives from various sensors. The queries you submit to the live stream processing engine will always be kept up-to-date with the latest information. Alert your application and act in real-time to events such as:

  • sudden change in temperature
  • the average temperature over multiple sensors exceeds a limit
  • the sum of temperatures over some time window exceeds a limit

Tip

ITTIA IoT streams are most useful for Internet of Things applications that rely on aggregating many sensors to act in real-time
